reviewText: Mitsuko is having an affair with her brother in law Kouji and her father in law, but mostly Kouji. and for months she has tried to stop it but Mitsuko has started to have romantic feelings for Kouji. then one day Mitsuko and Kouji see his step mother Sumie cheating on her husband with the gardeners. But Kouji seems to be turned on by this.
I like the story. I got the fist 1 and need the 3 one,
Glad I got this to go with my collection of movies if you like odd porn this is good to start off with Im just having trouble find the other volumes on dvd...

Mistreated Bride Is another one of Japanamie that you just have to own. It's a four part story of a that married into a Family that is just a little on the wacked side to say the least. The Bride is hot and how any man could marry a women like that a just forget her needs is beyound me. First the Father tries to abuse her bet her brother - in - law saves her but that's only so he can have her for himself. The art work is great and the story line is better than most hentai you will find out their. Part one was just the warm up but it was a good foundation it's two where things heat up. This is a keeper and one I am glad I own I just wish I had three and four hard to find, very hard to find

I have owned all four Volumes of Mistreated Bride for a year now and I have to say it grows on you. It was created by Miyabi Tsuzuru, the same guy who brought us Taboo Charming Mother. And even though it is an altogether new story, there are enough similarities that it should keep fans entertained. It is the story of a young bride who leaves Tokyo with her five year old daughter to live with her Husband and his very old and eccentric but powerful family in a small village in southern japan. Her husband's family is so powerful it nearly owns the small village. Now that his father has retired Ichiro has to move home with his young wife and little girl to run the family money lending business. He has very little time for his daughter and none for his wife, as a result she feels lonely and neglected. His father though old, still feels like the salaried man he once was, sees how he ignores his new bride Mitsuko and decides to take advantage of her himself and tries satisfy her. He does as much as he can but old age has taken its told. Seeing all this happen in secret is Ichiro's college age brother Kouji who decides he is up to the task and blackmails Mitsuko into having sex with him. Needless to say he is more than capable. Over time the indifference of her husband and the abusiveness of her father in law leads her to crave more time with her brother in law. Vol. 1 and Vol. 4 are story driven, the prologue and epilogue of the story. Vol. 2 and Vol. 3 are the best disks because they contain most of the action and sex. You could just watch these two without really missing to much, but the story is pretty good for Hentai that is, so you might want to get the other two Volumes when you can to complete the story. If you're interested in sex and romance Vol. 2 is by far the best of the four, follow by Vol. 3. The character designs are good, especially the ladies Mitsuko and Sumie the Mother in law, but Kouji seems a bit misanthropic; he has big lips and a Moe Howard haircut and his harsh treatment of Mitsuko in the begining all takes a while to get use to.  But his character design is good where it counts in a Hentai story,if you know what I mean. Not quite Taboo Charming Mother, but a good sexy story!
